creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two gold and red fabric covered albums enclosed in tri-folding blue case; albums contain circular vignettes of landscapes
inscription:
Signature,Title, Inscriptions, Mark, Seals, and Labels

various inscriptions inside
markings: pencil mark ULC on front cover; various seals throughout; labels on outer cover R side: [Taigado Teiryo / Juben Jugi]; label inside cover R side: [Taigado Teiryo / Juben/ Jugi / 1903]
signed: front cover, center L edge; front cover ULC
title: Juben Jugi, one of pair
